CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: The period of time to await between two runs of the connector.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

EMAIL_INTEL_IMAP_TLP_LEVEL.description: Traffic Light Protocol (TLP) level to apply on objects imported into OpenCTI.

EMAIL_INTEL_IMAP_RELATIVE_IMPORT_START_D.description: The relative start date to import emails in ISO 8601 duration format (e.g. P30D for 30 days).

EMAIL_INTEL_IMAP_HOST.description: IMAP server hostname or IP address

EMAIL_INTEL_IMAP_USERNAME.description: Username to authenticate to the IMAP server. Either `password` or `google_token_json` must be set as well.

EMAIL_INTEL_IMAP_PASSWORD.description: Password to authenticate to the IMAP server. Either `password` or `google_token_json` must be set.

EMAIL_INTEL_IMAP_GOOGLE_TOKEN_JSON.description: Content of the token.json file from Google API. Either `password` or `google_token_json` must be set.

EMAIL_INTEL_IMAP_ATTACHMENTS_MIME_TYPES.description: List of attachment MIME types to process (comma-separated)
